Text.Name: BodyPratice_BodyRecover
Text.Desc: The self-healing speed of Physical cultivators when they were injured.

Text.Name: BodyPratice_MaxZhenQi
Text.Desc: Maximum True Qi of Physical cultivators.

Text.Name: BodyPratice_RecoverZhenQi
Text.DisplayName: True Qi Recovery Rate Base Value
Text.Desc: The basic True Qi recovery rate of Physical cultivators.

Text.Name: BodyPratice_DefenseRecoverZhenQi
Text.DisplayName: Recovery Mode True Qi Recovery Rate
Text.Desc: The percentage of True Qi to be recovered per second when a physical cultivator's True Qi is exhausted.

Text.Name: BodyPratice_CatchFaboValue
Text.Desc: The amount of additional True Qi to be consumed when a physical cultivator is suppressing an artifact.

Text.Name: BodyPratice_BodyStrong
Text.Desc: The ability of a physical cultivator's body to withstand damages. The stronger the body, the less likely it is to die from injuries.

Text.Name: BodyPratice_QuenchingSpeed
Text.Desc: The speed at which Physical cultivators remold their bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAtk_EquptMaxCount
Text.Desc: The maximum number of Offensive Secret Bodies that a physical cultivator can activate simultaneously.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartDef_EquptMaxCount
Text.Desc: The maximum number of Defensive Secret Bodies that a physical cultivator can activate simultaneously.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartBuff_EquptMaxCount
Text.Desc: The maximum number of Effective Secret Bodies that a physical cultivator can activate simultaneously.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_Other_TunaAddp
Text.Desc: The bonus applied to a physical cultivator's efficiency of gaining essence from breathing.

Text.Name: BodyPratice_SuperPartCostAddP
Text.Desc: The bonus applied to the True Qi Consumption Rate of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPratice_SuperPartRecoverAddP
Text.DisplayName: Secret Body True Qi Recovery Rate
Text.Desc: The bonus applied to the True Qi Recovery Rate of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAddp_AtkPower
Text.Desc: The bonus applied to the power of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAddp_DefPower
Text.Desc: The bonus applied to the Endurance of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAddp_AtkRate
Text.Desc: The bonus applied to the Attack Accuracy of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAddp_DefRate
Text.Desc: The bonus applied to the Defense Success Rate of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAddp_ArmorPenetration
Text.Desc: The bonus applied to the Qi Barrier Penetration of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAddp_CatchFabao
Text.Desc: The bonus applied to the Artifact Suppression Chance of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAddv_AtkPower
Text.Desc: The bonus value applied to the power of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAddv_DefPower
Text.Desc: The bonus value applied to the Endurance of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAddv_AtkRate
Text.Desc: The bonus value applied to the Attack Accuracy of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAddv_DefRate
Text.Desc: The bonus value applied to the Defense Success Rate of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAddv_ArmorPenetration
Text.Desc: The bonus value applied to the Qi Barrier Penetration of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_SuperPartAddv_CatchFabao
Text.Desc: The bonus value applied to the Artifact Suppression Chance of all currently activated Secret Bodies.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_AngerFireNum
Text.Desc: The maximum number of memories Physical cultivators can remember as their Painful Memories.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_AngerFireDuration
Text.Desc: The lasting time of a Furious Berserk when the Physical cultivator initiate it.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_AngerFireEffectAddp
Text.Desc: The effective strength of a Furious Berserk when the Physical cultivator initiate it.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_EatItemMaxRate
Text.Desc: The highest tier of items that Physical cultivators can devour.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_EatItemProduceCountAddp
Text.Desc: The bonus percentage applied to the number of Essence obtained by Physical cultivators after devouring items.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_EatItemProduceRateAddp
Text.Desc: The bonus percentage applied to the chance of obtaining rare Essence by Physical cultivators after devouring items.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_RollAddtion_Cache1
Text.Desc: The bonus chance of an uncommon evolution direction to occur when a physical cultivator is remolding.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_RollAddtion_Cache2
Text.Desc: The bonus chance of a rare evolution direction to occur when a physical cultivator is remolding.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_RollAddtion_Cache3
Text.Desc: The bonus chance of a superb evolution direction to occur when a physical cultivator is remolding.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_RollAddtion_Cache4
Text.Desc: The bonus chance of an epic evolution direction to occur when a physical cultivator is remolding.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_MaxFoodAddtion
Text.Desc: Physical Cultivator's Max Hunger Bonus
